title: Volume Conversion
summary: Convert between cubic metres and cubic millimetres.
whenToUse: Use when detail drawings list volumes in smaller units.
howToUse: Enter the volume in cubic metres to convert.
commonMistakes: Forgetting that cubic units scale by 1,000,000,000 when converting m³ to mm³.
siteTips: Use cubic metres for ordering materials; reserve mm³ for detail checks.
verification: The converted number should be far larger in mm³.
